Question
========
  
If the value of -2log-likelihood becomes smaller, then.... 
Answerlist
----------
* The fit of the model gets worse: a lower value implies a smaller proportion of unexplained variance.
* The fit of the model gets worse: a lower value implies a larger proportion of unexplained variance.
* The fit of the model gets better: a lower value implies a smaller proportion of unexplained variance.
* The fit of the model gets better: a lower value implies a larger proportion of unexplained variance.
